plot: Due to his family's circumstances, high school student Kyōsuke has been separated from his sister Namika for around 10 years. When they are finally reunited, Kyōsuke realizes a lot has changed about her. Completely turned Osaka-n, Namika tries to teach him about the ways of the place she lived and the way they talk.
ending_theme: "Osaka Beautiful Name" (大阪ビューティフル・ネーム) by Kana Asumi (ep 1)
"I'm proud Osaka" (I’m proud 大阪) by Kana Asumi (ep 2)
"Sasubee wa Itsumo Ame" (さすべぇはいつも雨) by Kana Asumi (ep 3)
"Namika no Love Song" (浪花のラブソング; Namika's Love Song) by Kana Asumi (ep 4)
"Hanshin no Omoide ga Ippai" (阪神の思い出がいっぱい; Lots of Memories of the Hanshin) by Kana Asumi (ep 5)
"Negiri no Ballad" (値切りのバラード;Ballad of Bargains) by Kana Asumi (ep 6)
"Kiyou to Doubutsu Gara no Fuku" (きようよ どうぶつ柄の服) by Kana Asumi (ep 7)
"Jikai Yokoku no Uta" (次回予告の歌;The Song of Next Episode Preview) by Kana Asumi (ep 8)
"Motteke! Taisou Fuku" (もってけ！体操ふく;Bring it! Gym Clothes) by Kana Asumi (ep 9)
